content: Heya, could I get a second pair of eyes for clippy#6931? I reviewed it all, but still it seems to be a significant enough change to warrant some extra attention :smile:
it seems your link is broken: https://github.com/rust-lang/rust-clippy/pull/6931 :wink:
I left a comment. I would separate the cleanup (merge ASAP) and actually moving the lint out of nursery in different PRs though.
